paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with hormone receptor-positive (HR+)/HER2− stage IIIA invasive ductal carcinoma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 66-yr-old Caucasian man underwent a right radical mastectomy and sentinel lymph node biopsy for an infiltrative breast carcinoma of papillary histotype.

functional_data.summary: No clear breast cancer susceptibility loci identified; contradictory studies suggest potential risk.

variants.additional_notes: Variant is classified as a variant of uncertain significance (VUS).
key_quotes: None are clear breast cancer susceptibility loci; however, certain contradictory studies have suggested that these BRCA2 polymorphisms may or may not confer increased risk.
